bike.description: M4 Manipulated Alloy w/ ORE technology, fully butted w/refined tapers & reduced wall thickness, disc & rim brake compatible, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Manitou Skareb Comp, 80mm travel, coil spring, rebound adj., compression lock-out, alloy steerer. (Note: Some bikes appear with Rock Shox Duke XC, 80mm travel, air spring, external rebound adjust, alloy steerer.)
